name: COTI Governance Token
description: gCOTI is the COTI Governance Token. gCOTI empowers community governance over COTI's Treasury for the first time ever. It is the first token to be issued on top of the MultiDAG 2.0 Mainnet, based on the CMD (COTI MultiDAG) standard. The introduction of gCOTI allows Treasury participants to gain multiple benefits from COTIâ€™s Treasury such as: Governance, APY Booster and participation in liquidation rewards.
